title: mcmmo能实现本地数据一键导入MYSQL吗？
author: dddfly
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
/mcconvert database <flatfile|sql>

这个命令用来转换数据 从文件到sql 或者sql到文件

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
Description:
Convert between different database and formula types.

Usage:
/mcconvert database <flatfile|sql> /mcconvert experience <linear|exponential>

Aliases:
none

Permission:
mcmmo.commands.mcconvert

Details:
This command can be used to convert a flatfile database to MySQL, or the other way round. It is also used to convert from a linear XP formula to an exponential shaped formula curve.

https://github.com/mcMMO-Dev/mcMMO/wiki/Command-reference#mcconvert

replies.author: dddfly
